parts.text: {"word":"zerfallen","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(建物、物体などが)崩壊する、朽ち果てる、ぼろぼろになる","english_definition":"(of a building, object, etc.) to fall into disrepair; to decay; to crumble.","examples":[{"sentence":"Die Burg ist im Laufe der Jahrhunderte zerfallen.","translation":"その城は何世紀もの間に崩壊した。"},{"sentence":"Das alte Haus zerfiel langsam.","translation":"その古い家はゆっくりと朽ち果てていった。"},{"sentence":"Die Dokumente zerfielen zu Staub.","translation":"その書類は粉々に崩れて塵になった。"}],"collocations":["zerfallen in Staub (塵に帰す)","langsam zerfallen (ゆっくりと朽ち果てる)","völlig zerfallen (完全に崩壊する)"],"synonyms":["verfallen","verrotten","einstürzen","zusammenbrechen","auseinanderfallen"],"antonyms":["entstehen","aufgebaut werden","erhalten bleiben"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(関係、組織などが)崩壊する、分裂する、瓦解する","english_definition":""(of a relationship, organization, etc.) to disintegrate; to fall apart; to break down.","examples":[{"sentence":"Die Ehe der beiden zerfiel nach wenigen Jahren.","translation":"二人の結婚は数年後に崩壊した。"},{"sentence":"Die Partei zerfiel in mehrere Fraktionen.","translation":"その政党はいくつかの派閥に分裂した。"},{"sentence":"Die alte Ordnung zerfiel.","translation":"古い秩序は崩壊した。"}],"collocations":["zerfallen in Fraktionen (派閥に分裂する)","auseinander zerfallen (完全に崩壊する)"],"synonyms":["auseinanderbrechen","sich auflösen","scheitern","zusammenbrechen","sich entzweien"],"antonyms":["zusammenhalten","sich festigen","funktionieren"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(化学)分解する","english_definition":"(chemistry) to decompose.","examples":[{"sentence":"Die Substanz zerfällt in ihre Bestandteile.","translation":"その物質は構成要素に分解する。"}],"collocations":[],"synonyms":["sich zersetzen","sich auflösen"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"接頭辞 'zer-' (破壊、分離) + 動詞 'fallen' (落ちる)","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/t͡sɛɐ̯ˈfalən/","syllables":"zer-fal-len"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["zerfalle","zerfällst","zerfällt","zerfallen","zerfallt","zerfallen"],"past_simple":"zerfiel","past_participle":"zerfallen","auxiliary_verb":"sein"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'zerfallen' は分離、崩壊、劣化のプロセスを表す強力な動詞です。建物、関係、または抽象的な概念に使用できます。","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Das Haus ist gefallen.","correct":"Das Haus ist zerfallen.","note":"'fallen' は単に「落ちる」という意味ですが、'zerfallen' は「崩壊する、朽ち果てる」という意味です。接頭辞 'zer-' が重要です。"}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["Zerfall (名詞: 崩壊、腐敗、分解)","Zerfallszeit (名詞: 崩壊時間、減衰時間)"],"related_verbs":["verfallen (期限が切れる、荒廃する)","auseinanderfallen (バラバラになる)"]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"N/A","frequency_google_ngram":"N/A","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"N/A","text":"N/A"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Die alte Brücke begann zu zerfallen, nachdem sie jahrelang vernachlässigt worden war.","translation":"その古い橋は、長年放置された後、崩壊し始めた。","type":"general","meaning_category":"崩壊する"},{"sentence":"Die Freundschaft zerfiel, als sie unterschiedliche Wege gingen.","translation":"彼らが別々の道を歩むにつれて、その友情は崩壊した。","type":"general","meaning_category":"崩壊する"},{"sentence":"Das radioaktive Material zerfällt mit der Zeit.","translation":"その放射性物質は時間とともに分解する。","type":"scientific","meaning_category":"分解する"}]}
